code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Card from"../../shared/components/UIElements/Card";import"./UserItem.css";import Avatar from"../../shared/components/UIElements/Avatar";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserItem=props=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"user-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"user-item__content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/".concat(props.id,"/places"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-item__image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{image:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_ASSET_URL,"/").concat(props.image),alt:props.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-item__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[props.placeCount," ",props.placeCount===1?"Place":"Places"]})]})]})})});};export default UserItem;
